oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Introduction to the use and perspectives of the Organic Eprints archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Elsgaard, Lars
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This presentation summarizes the current status of the Organic Eprints archive in terms of deposited papers and visitors. Advantages of using the archive are highlighted from the perspective of users, depositors and webmasters. Finally, an introduction is given to copyright issues and the position of publishers and journals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Elsgaard, Lars (2007) Introduction to the use and perspectives of the Organic Eprints archive. Speech at: 3rd International Congress of the European Integrated Project Quality Low Input Food (QLIF), University of Hohenheim, Germany, March 20 - 23, 2007.
